rooms.description: A spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to maximize morning sunlight. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by aligning seating areas towards the north.
Dining area located adjacent to the living room, with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows on its western side.
Modern kitchen integrated into the ground floor. Vastu alignment ensures that the cooking area faces east for positivity and health.
Functional bathroom strategically placed near the kitchen to maintain convenience while adhering to Vastu by avoiding placing water elements in north-east direction.
Dedicated home office area on ground floor with ample natural light and a quiet corner to foster productivity. It is located in the south-west region to support stability and focus.
Guest bedroom on ground floor with an adjoining spacious balcony overlooking the garden. The design follows Vastu principles by positioning it in the north-east direction for positive energy.

openings.description: Main entrance placed at the north-east corner, ensuring a welcoming Vastu flow and ease of movement within the bungalow.
Balconies adjacent to each bedroom ensure ample sunlight. Each balcony is designed with privacy screens that complement the Chettinad aesthetic.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for a panoramic view and enhanced natural light. Its south-west positioning adheres to Vastu recommendations.
Additional bedroom with an adjoining balcony. The north-west orientation supports positive energy according to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the two floors, designed with open railings for safety and visual continuity. Its placement in the center ensures balanced energy flow between levels.

design_overview.description: The bungalow design is inspired by traditional Chettinad architecture with modern elements such as floor-to-ceiling windows and spacious balconies. The layout incorporates Vastu-compliant principles suitable for a joint family living environment.
